xuiNotificationService
service in module xui

Description

Service that provides generic notifications to consumers that subscribe.

Methods

  • post(channel, arguments)

    Used by publishers to post notifications to the specified channel.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    channelstring

    Channel on which the notifications are posted.

    argumentsany

    Supplied to the notification handler.

  • subscribe(channel, handler)

    Allows consumers to subscribe to notifications for the specified channel. Be sure to unsubscribe to avoid memory leaks.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    channelstring

    Channel on which the notifications are posted.

    handlerNotificationHandler

    Callback used by the consumer to act upon the notification (NotificationHandler = (args:any)) => void;

  • unsubscribe(channel, handler)

    Allows consumers to unsubscribe from notifications for the specified channel.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    channelstring

    Channel on which the notifications are posted.

    handlerNotificationHandler

    Callback used by the consumer to act upon the notification (NotificationHandler = (args:any)) => void;

Properties

  • Channel

    Channels well-known to xui.

    • 'highlight' : sent to notify that an object should be highlighted.
